ca.ualberta.cs.oneclick_cookbook

Class StorageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.oneclick_cookbook.StorageHandler

  • public class StorageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles the local storage of files on the device. Allows caller to save and load a recipe to external storage or cahce.
    Author:
    Kenneth Armstrong

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StorageHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Recipe loadRecipe(java.lang.String id)
      Loads the recipe from external storage.
      Recipe loadRecipeCache(java.lang.String id)
      Loads the requested recipe from cache by searching for the id.
      void saveRecipe(Recipe r)
      Saves the passed recipe into external storage.
      void saveRecipeCache(Recipe r)
      Saves the passed recipe into cache.

      • saveRecipe

        public void saveRecipe(Recipe r)
        Saves the passed recipe into external storage.
        Parameters:
        r - The recipe that is to be saved.

      • loadRecipe

        public Recipe loadRecipe(java.lang.String id)
        Loads the recipe from external storage. Returns the recipe.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the required recipe
        Returns:
        The requried recipe

      • saveRecipeCache

        public void saveRecipeCache(Recipe r)
        Saves the passed recipe into cache.
        Parameters:
        r - Recipe to be saved.

      • loadRecipeCache

        public Recipe loadRecipeCache(java.lang.String id)
        Loads the requested recipe from cache by searching for the id.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the required recipe
        Returns:
        The required Recipe.
